readable.title: 1067675215_7336a694d6
readable.content: A man in blue shorts is laying in the street . A man in blue shorts lays down outside in a parking lot . A man laying down in middle of street during heavy traffic . A man lies on a mat in a parking lot between a brown SUV and a yellow pickup with an open door . A shirtless man is laying down in the middle of a busy street .
